Limit intake if IBS symptoms occur after ingestion of spicy foods. Please note that the 'green' traffic light rating system allows you to eat multiple serves of ‘green’ foods per meal. Nutritional guidelines recommend that on average per day you should eat at least 5 serves of vegetables and 2 serves of fruits.
